alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 9:02PM CST until November 20 at 9:45PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Amite County in southern Mississippi... * Until 945 PM CST. * At 901 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gloster, or 11 miles west of Liberty, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, Gloster, and Smithdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southern Mississippi.
